original_title: Treasures Untold: The Making of Disney's 'The Little Mermaid'
overview: Find out how the spectacular music inspired the animation, and learn more about the development of the characters—such as how Ursula ended up being a big octopus—and how the memorable song "Part of Your World" almost got cut from the film.
title: Treasures Untold: The Making of Disney's 'The Little Mermaid'
